title: Video: FTSE – Blood On My Hands
body:
Never one to shy away from crucifying himself over music that sounds like pretty people should be having fun to it somewhere, **FTSE**’s back with a video for _Blood On My Hands_, a track off forthcoming full-length **_Joyless._**

It’s an [ethically](http://www.khama.co.uk/)–[sourced](http://sweetcavanagh.com/), [self-produced](http://www.lukebather.com/about/), [runway](http://birdsong.london/)–[struttin’](http://www.faiiint.com/faiiint/) mashup of apathy & guilt, vibing on the half-realised complicity of your market-variety AirMax locavore. It also has some [bare dench](https://twitter.com/blanksy_h/status/461574690805665792 "This brere's dad said it, so can I. ") ersatz horns in it, and what may or may not be some pretty people having fun. Watch below.

**Joyless** _is out August 28th on [Lucky Number](http://www.luckynumbermusic.com/artists/ftse/ "13. ")_
